	- minETH = minETH.add(_min) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c4/c430b33fceaaf717ae29754c1cdace06f5bb51ab_ACOCoin.sol#434) 
	- maxETH = 0 (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c4/c430b33fceaaf717ae29754c1cdace06f5bb51ab_ACOCoin.sol#435) 
	- maxETH = maxETH.add(_max) (../../../Desktop/SmarthER/mainnet/c4/c430b33fceaaf717ae29754c1cdace06f5bb51ab_ACOCoin.sol#436)
